title: "[FR-008] Screenshots"
labels: [feature, screenshots, beta]

---

## Summary
Add screenshot capture as tool and HUD option.

## Requirements
- Fullscreen and active window capture.
- Save path configurable.
- Trigger via /screenshot, button, or voice.
- Notification on save.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Screenshots saved correctly.
- HUD shows confirmation.
- Works across Win/Mac/Linux.

## Dependencies
- FR-007 MCP Core
